DOC.brief_title: Myelofibrosis Essential Thrombocythemia Observational Study ( MOST )
DOC.criteria: MF cohort : Diagnosis MF lowrisk use DIPSS risk categorization OR intermediate1 risk DIPSS reason age alone . ET cohort : Diagnosis ET age ≥ 60 year OR history thromboembolic event OR currently receive ETdirected therapy ( eg , hydroxyurea , anagrelide , interferon , busulfan , ruxolitinib , etc ) . Willing able provide write informed consent . Willing able complete patient assessment questionnaires either alone minimal assistance caregiver and/or train site personnel . Under supervision physician current care MF ET . Individuals participate blind investigational drug study . Individuals participate Incyte investigational/interventional drug trial ( company investigatorsponsored study ) complete 30day end study visit . Life expectancy ≤ 6 month .
